item.description:
I will be at the theater at 7, we should head in for seats at 7:30 and showtime is 8PM. Please note, they are offering this movie in two formats, real 3d and imax 3d, the 8 PM show is in real 3d.

The movie will be showing upstairs, so I will try to grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalators. If you get there before me, please grab a table.


The trailer for this movie make it look like it is going to be funny, and I love all the gadgets and the gorgeous car they use.....can't help it I am so a gadget girl. Some of my favorite things in Bond movies were all those marvelous toys that Bond got to use.

Please note, meetup is no longer letting us set up maybe as an option, in spite of the many complaints that were sent to them. Idiots! So don't blame the organizers....if you don't like it, email meetup to complain. Maybe if they get enough emails about it they will put the option back in. In any case, if you are rsvping yes, when you mean maybe, please put a note in your rsvp. Also please keep it up to date and change to no if you are not going to attend. It only takes a second and makes it easier for me to manage the event.

If you miss us on the way in, look for us after. As always, we will be gathering after the movie, outside the room where was shown to discuss the movie a bit, allow for restroom breaks and get a head count for those who are interested in going out after. Our usual stomping grounds...the Rockbottom will be closed for renovations, but I have some other options we can check out in the area.


Release Date: January 14, 2011 (3D/2D theaters and IMAX 3D)
Studio: Columbia Pictures (Sony)
Director: Michel Gondry
Screenwriter: Seth Rogen, Evan Goldberg
Starring: Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz, Christoph Waltz, Edward James Olmos, David Harbour, Tom Wilkinson
Genre: Action, Adventure, Crime
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website:
http://www.sonypictur...


Plot Summary: Britt Reid (Seth Rogen) is the son of LA's most prominent and respected media magnate and perfectly happy to maintain a directionless existence on the party scene – until his father (Tom Wilkinson) mysteriously dies, leaving Britt his vast media empire. Striking an unlikely friendship with one of his father's more industrious and inventive employees, Kato (Jay Chou), they see their chance to do something meaningful for the first time in their lives: fight crime. But in order to do this, they decide to become criminals themselves – protecting the law by breaking it, Britt becomes the vigilante The Green Hornet as he and Kato hit the streets.

Using all his ingenuity and skill, Kato builds the ultimate in advanced retro weaponry, The Black Beauty, an indestructible car equal parts firepower and horsepower. Rolling in a mobile fortress on wheels and striking the bad guys with Kato's">Kato's">Kato's">Kato's clever gadgets, The Green Hornet and Kato quickly start making a name for themselves, and with the help of Britt's new secretary, Lenore Case (Cameron Diaz), they begin hunting down the man who controls LA's gritty underworld: Benjamin Chudnofsky (Christoph Waltz). But Chudnofsky has plans of his own: to swat down The Green Hornet once and for all.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin and have a meetup sign. I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator.
item.name: The Green Hornet
